price: (44) Do you order righteousness of the people and forget[25] yourselves while you recite the Scripture? Then will you not reason?
arabic: ۞ أَتَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَتَنسَوۡنَ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَتۡلُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: atamurūna al-nāsa bil-biri watansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatlūna al-kitāba afalā taʿqilūna
